name: subscribePeers
shortDescription: Subscribes peer events that are to be sent to an event server when the init flag "subscribePeers" is used
description: This method is used to subscribe peer events after calling "init" with the "subscribePeers" flag set.

parameters.name: eventServerId
parameters.description: This is either the url exactly as specified in "init" or the WebSocket client ID.

parameters.name: peerIds
parameters.description: This is an integer array containing the peer IDs to be subscribed. There is no check to see whether a peer ID is valid.
